title: Migration-mitigated crossover of organic redox anions across a proton-exchange membrane
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4882-4892
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00682H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Penghui Ding, Mikhail Vagin, Mohammad Javad Jafari, Aleksandar Y. Mehandzhiyski, Viktor Gueskine, Tobias Abrahamsson, Igor Zozoulenko, Thomas Ederth, Reverant Crispin
We introduce a membrane electrolyzer for the generation of hydrogen peroxide via oxygen reduction and catalyst-free oxidation of quinones. The study reports the effect of the applied coulombic forces on ions, which is the origin of crossover.
